title: Clozapine-Induced Myocarditis
itunes:title: Clozapine-Induced Myocarditis
description:
When should you suspect clozapine-induced myocarditis? Myocarditis has nonspecific manifestations. In this episode, Dr. Phelps explains the clinical presentation and the steps to take if you suspect myocarditis.

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 32
  • Clozapine-Induced Myocarditis: Electronic Health Register Analysis of Incidence, Timing, Clinical Markers, and Diagnostic Accuracy
